raw_text:
Bookmakers back Aviator for Oscar
 
 The Aviator has been tipped by UK bookmakers as the favourite to win the best film award at this year's Oscars.
 
 Ray star Jamie Foxx is clear favourite in the best actor category while Million Dollar Baby's Hilary Swank is tipped to win the best actress prize. Bookmakers predict Cate Blanchett will be named best supporting actress. William Hill and Ladbrokes have given The Aviator 4/9 and 8/13 odds of winning best film, with Million Dollar Baby in second place at 9/4.
 
 Bet Direct and Bet 365 also tip The Aviator, with the majority of bookmakers regarding Finding Neverland as the outsider. The Aviator is also widely tipped to win the best director prize for Martin Scorsese. British star Clive Owen is second favourite at William Hill to take the best supporting actor award, for his performance in Closer. The favourite in that category is Sideways star Thomas Hayden Church. Vera Drake star Imelda Staunton has 5/1 odds of winning the best actress Oscar at Bet 365 and William Hill, ahead of fellow UK star Kate Winslet who has odds of 25/1 at William Hill.
 
 Mike Leigh is the outsider in the best director category for Vera Drake, a position he holds jointly with Ray's Taylor Hackford at bookmakers VC Bet. This year's Academy Awards will be handed out in Hollywood on 27 February. X Factor judge Sharon Osbourne will present Sky television's live coverage of the event. Meanwhile, Clive Owen's best supporting actor nomination has led a bookmaker to shorten his odds of becoming the next James Bond. He has moved from 4/1 to 5/2 favourite to play 007, with Hugh Jackman and Ewan McGregor joint second favourite. "Clive Owen's nomination has sparked a betting frenzy from James Bond fans, who feel that his heightened global recognition will have done his chances of becoming the next Bond a world of good," said William Hill spokesman Rupert Adams.

tinyllama:1.1b: The UK bookmaker's agency, Bet Direct, has predicted The Aviator as the favorite to win the best film award at this year's Oscar ceremony. Meanwhile, betting companies, including VC Bet and William Hill, have offered odds of 4/9 and 8/13 for The Aviator to take the prestigious category prize. Clively Owen, British star of "Findling Neverland", is also widely tipped for the best supporting actor award, with the bookmaker placing him at 5/2. Other contenders include Kate Winslet ("Sideways") and Imelda Staunton ("Vera Drake"), both of whom have odds of 25/1 at VC Bet. The Academy Awards will be held in Hollywood on February 27th, with Clively Owen the outside favorite for playing James Bond's successor.
tinydolphin:1.1b:
In the world of movie industry, Oscar, the prestigious Academy Awards, will be held this year on February 27th. UK bookmakers are keeping close track of who is predicted to win in various categories. The betting interest has been focused on some of the prominent movies for this event and they are closely watching which movie will take the top prize. 

Among these popular films, one of the most anticipated ones is The Aviator starring Hilary Swank. According to bookmakers' odds, The Aviator is favored to win the best film award at the Oscars this year. The movie's director Martin Scorsese has also been a favorite among UK bookies, as his performance in Finding Neverland has earned him praises and placed him among those who have a strong shot of winning the best director award. 

Another popular film is Closer starring Kate Winslet. Many people believe that she will take home the best actress award at the Oscars, which is being contested by Vera Drake star Imelda Staunton and Cate Blanchett's performance in The Aviator. On the other hand, Hilary Swank has also been tipped for a win in the best actor category. 

Another well-received movie in this year's Oscar race is Million Dollar Baby starring Hilary Swank and Gerard Way. Many think that Hilary will become the first female film director to win an Oscar since Kathryn Bigelow's The Painted Veil in 2010. On the other hand, Gerard Way has already won a Grammy Award for Best New Artist and has received positive reviews for his performance in Million Dollar Baby. 

Bookmakers are also keeping close tabs on the race for the best film award, with several surprise results predicted this year. For instance, many people were surprised when The Blind Side won the best film award at the Oscars last year. Many think that this movie's star Jake Gyllen will win the best actor award in this year's ceremony. 

In summary, UK bookmakers are keeping a close eye on some of the most anticipated movies for the upcoming Oscar Awards and their respective betting odds. The race for the best film award is shaping up to be incredibly competitive, with Hilary Swank's The Aviator being the leading favorite according to the latest bookmaking results. 

This year's Academy Awards will be held in Hollywood on February 27th and it promises to be an exciting event.
